Detailed Description

A class representing a modular task to be used with the On-Demand structures.

Decodes a file into a simpleBlockFile, but not immediately.

This is an abstract class that subclasses will have to derive the types from. For any type there should only be one ODDecodeTask associated with a given track. There could be the ODBlockFiles of several FLACs in one track (after copy and pasting), so things aren't as simple as they seem - the implementation needs to be robust enough to allow all the user changes such as copy/paste, delete, and so on.

ODFileDecoder * ODDecodeTask::GetOrCreateMatchingFileDecoder ( ODDecodeBlockFile *  blockFile  )  [virtual]

there could be the ODBlockFiles of several FLACs in one track (after copy and pasting) so we keep a list of decoders that keep track of the file names, etc, and check the blocks against them. Blocks that have IsDataAvailable()==false are blockfiles to be decoded. if BlockFile::GetDecodeType()==ODDecodeTaskGetODType() then this decoder should handle it. Decoders are accessible with the methods below. These aren't thread-safe and should only be called from the decoding thread.

References CreateFileDecoder(), ODDecodeBlockFile::GetAudioFileName(), and mDecoders.

Referenced by DoSomeInternal().

void ODDecodeTask::Update (  )  [protected, virtual]

by default creates the order of the wavetrack to load.

Readjusts the blockfile order in the default manner. If we have had an ODRequest Then it updates in the OD manner.

Reimplemented from ODTask.
